vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ki.15.18;
son of: Tabrimmon (H2886)
§ Ben-hadad = "son of [the false god] Hadad"
1) the king of Syria, contemporary with Asa of Judah
2) the son of Hazael, also king of Syria
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
便哈達 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "哈達[神明]的兒子"
1) 敘利亞的國王, 跟猶大的亞撒同時期
2) 哈薛的兒子, 也是敘利亞的國王 (王下13章)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
便哈达 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "哈达[神明]的儿子"
1) 叙利亚的国王, 跟犹大的亚撒同时期
2) 哈薛的儿子, 也是叙利亚的国王 (王下13章)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Ki.6.24
§ Ben-hadad = "son of [the false god] Hadad"
1) the king of Syria, contemporary with Asa of Judah
2) the son of Hazael, also king of Syria

A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Ki.13.3;
son of: Hazael (H2371)
§ Ben-hadad = "son of [the false god] Hadad"
1) the king of Syria, contemporary with Asa of Judah
2) the son of Hazael, also king of Syria
